name: PGA Tour Golf II
overview: A follow-up to PGA Tour Golf and a reduced version of its Genesis counterpart where the player can choose play as a generic pro golfer or as an amateur and compete against four real-life pros including Fred Couples, Paul Azinger, Craig Stadler, and Fuzzy Zoeller with six different locations to choose from. Players may choose to either play in tournament mode, skins play, or learn the basics of the game in practice mode.
